channel.title: self healing datacenter on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in self healing datacenter on DefinIT

item.title: vRealize Operations Webinar Series : 2015 :Part 1 : Building Self Healing Environments with #vROps
item.description: A series of webcasts on vRealize Operations Manager 6.x, helping you learn about anything and everything about the solution. Some of the examples include, vROps Policies, Alert Definitions, Automated Action Framework, integration to third party etc. This would include power point and live demonstrations. The session would range anywhere between 60 to 90 minutes. With 100+ registrations and more than 70 live attendees, it was definitely a great start to this series.

item.title: Starting 2016 with a bang – #vROps Webinar Series
item.description: With a new year comes new things and I am delighted to announce the start of a vROps based webinar series. These will consist of a set of live webcasts on different topics around vRealize Operations Manager open to public to attend live or view the recorded sessions later. Personally I am delighted to get the chance to work with Sunny Dua on this new project. Sunny is a well known and respected Senior Consultant at VMware and can be found often on twitter @Sunny_Dua.
